abstracts.cdata!:
This report appraises an Agricultural
            Credit Project for which a Bank loan of US$25 million
            equivalent is proposed. The loan would support a three year
            lending program of the Banco de Fomento Agropecuario del
            Peru (BFA) for medium- and long-term investments in
            agriculture, encompassing livestock and agro-industry to be
            made by small farmers, including cooperatives, borrower with
            government bearing the exchange risk.
